PaintState
public sealed
PaintState

A collection of working variables for painting a graph to a GDI+ surface.

Variables
_g
public readonly Graphics _g

The GDI+ painting surface.

_viewportArea
public readonly Rectangle _viewportArea

The area being painted to. Any elements outside of this area are not painted.

_zoomFactor
public readonly float _zoomFactor

Scales the elements being drawn.

_nodeDiameter
public readonly int _nodeDiameter

Diameter of drawn nodes.

_nodeDiameterHalf
public readonly int _nodeDiameterHalf

Used in conjunction with _nodeDiameter to draw nodes.

_backConnectionLegLength
public readonly float _backConnectionLegLength

Length of connection legs emanating from the base of nodes when drawing 'back' connections, i.e., to target nodes above the source node.

_nodeStateByIdx
public readonly ConnectionPointInfo[] _nodeStateByIdx

Connection point info per node. Used to track how many back-connections have been attached to nodes, so that new back-connections can be drawn without overlapping already drawn back-connections.

Functions
PaintState
public PaintState(
Graphics g,
Rectangle viewportArea,
float nodeDiameter,
float zoomFactor,
int nodeCount
)

Construct with the provided Graphics painting surface and painting metadata.

Parameters
g
Graphics

The GDI+ painting surface.

viewportArea
Rectangle

The area being painted to. Any elements outside of this area are not painted.

nodeDiameter
float

Diameter of drawn nodes.

zoomFactor
float

Painting zoom/scaling factor.

nodeCount
int

The number of nodes being painted.
